mapper.select: insert into applylist values((select ifnull(max(ano), 0)+1 from applylist a),#{kno},#{bno},#{userno},DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'대기')
select count(*) from resume r, applylist a where r.userno=a.userno and r.pno=#{pno} and a.bno=#{bno}
select n.bname, a.ano, n.typeoccup, r.userno,a.bno, r.pname,r.age,r.gender,r.phone,a.kno,a.passcheck from resume r, applylist a, notice n where r.userno=a.userno and a.bno=n.bno order by r.pname
select a.kno, a.ano, r.pno, n.mainimage, n.bname, n.typeoccup, n.region, n.deadline, a.passcheck from applylist a, notice n, resume r where a.bno=n.bno and r.userno = a.userno
mapper.update: update applylist set passcheck='합격' where userno=#{userno} and ano=#{ano}
update applylist set passcheck='불합격' where userno=#{userno} and ano=#{ano}
